summary: The Forbidden Five are back and more dangerous than ever in the BRAND NEW LEGO Ninjago: Dragons Rising – Season 3! They’re hunting for special weapons to unlock the source of their dark power – the Chaos Dragon! Meanwhile, the Ninja are racing to find their missing teammates and stop the villains before it’s too late. But we won’t spoil everything just yet – stay alert for sneak peeks, thrilling showdowns, and tons of surprises! Season 3 premieres WORLDWIDE on April 17th; tune in on the LEGO channel to catch even bigger battles, new villains, and more non-stop excitement!
name: Ninjago:Dragons Rising Season 3
name_cn: 乐高幻影忍者：神龙崛起 第三季
